resources.string:
1.Added outside server mode which is not requiring .rc modification
 2.Added setup wizard
 3.Added preset function
 4.Optimize multi-mode logic
 5.Now it can be fully systemless
 6.Added pid mode to enable adjust temporarily
 7.Fixed wrong root toast
 8."Check sourcecode" now has its own link
Please deliver the error to the address below
No root, this program will not work
Install, but no modify to .rc files
This would not work when there are no server running or the built-in server is not enabled

Assume you want to set a process called io.alcatraz.audiohq:play (Attention!!!Process name does not equals to package name, you can try run \'ps\' command to find out), Then you type the full process name below and the parameter below, after everything is checked ,apply it
Hello my friend, before you can start, let\'s take some minutes to complete the setup

I strongly recommend you NOT TO try installing, this action may cause your phone stuck at the boot animation,if you know what you are doing, and know how to remove the module from the recovery, click the button below to unlock the next step
There are risks to proceed further installation. Next step has been locked, if you know what you are doing and know how to remove the module from recovery You can click unlock below
Now, go to the website to download the module and install. This action may cause DAMAGE to your system, please make sure you know how to recover before you install the module
I have installed the matched module

Modify /system/etc/init/audioserver.rc, to enable built-in server,Attention:This would NOT work when /system is ro or .rc files are packaged in boot.img ,or the /system is ro(for /system ro, you can try write in recovery)
Congratulation, now the installation process is completed
Modify audioserver.rc to enable built-in server. This would NOT work when /system is ro or .rc files are packaged in boot.img
Use pid as adjust indicator,use it when you don\t wnt to save settings or the proc read function does not work
If you enable this option, please make sure your phone and other critical system process\'s volume has been set, unless you want to make your phone call to hear like silent
Lib version mismatch，current apk support lib[&current_match_version;],11.23.21,elf 0.9.2

The installation process contains a dangerous action, replace the /system/lib(64)/libaudioflinger.so, and the /system/etc/init/audioserver.rc this action may cause system can\'t start, turning your device into a brick or cause unrecoverable damage to your hardware, I strongly recommend to you proceed this action ONLY IF you have installed a file manager functional recovery and BACKUP the file(s) I mentioned above.
Please launch this application after the module is installed

Support: "32-bit LSB arm" /system/bin/audioserver elf, auto backup position /sdcard/audiohq_backups,The system will reboot after the installation is successful!!!, If your selinux in disabled or permissive you may select "Install, but no modify to .rc files"
You may retry，if this dialog always shown, please try install manually
Can\'t mount /system as read-write, please try install manually
Magisk not installed, do not try install native file before you get Magisk installed
